Moor Spa Hydrating Serum (2020 formulation)

Brand: Moor Spa

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Aqua, Plankton Extract, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Propanediol, Lauryl Lactate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Heilmoor Clay, Oleyl Erucate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Macrocy

l Phosphate, Macrocystis Pyrifera (Sea Kelp) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin, Algin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Lactic Acid, Ectoin

Directions: Massage gently over entire face and throat after cleansing. Follow with an appropriate Moor Spa Moisturizer for your skin type.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: A
ictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
